title: Ed Miliband – 2021 Comments on Power Cuts in North
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Ed Miliband, the Shadow Climate Change and Net Zero Secretary, in the House of Commons on 6 December 2021.
content:
Communities in the North have been badly let down, not just by the power networks but by central government in its crisis response and its oversight of the system.
